Canon Episode :
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
01-56, 72-89, 113-126, 129-143, 152-169, 172-175, 197-222, 243-256, 261-270, 272-278, 282-283, 296-302, 321-346, 362-375, 378-387, 391-393, 414-415, 418, 420-421, 424-426, 458-459, 463, 469-479, 484-500

Filler Episode :
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
